DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare efficacy 80W KTP photoselective laser vaporization prostatectomy ( PVP ) transurethral resection prostate ( TURP ) reduce volume prostate relieve obstruction men benign prostatic hyperplasia ( BPH ) non-randomized controlled design .
DOC.brief_title: Impact 80 W KTP Laser Vaporization Prostatectomy Severity Obstruction Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia
DOC.criteria: Symptomatic BPH International Score Prostate Symptom ( IPSS ) 13 great prostate volume 30 100 ML Peak urinary flow rate ( Qmax ) less 15 mL/s void volume > 125 mL PVR < 350mL Able give fully inform consent Subjects histological diagnosis prostate cancer Subjects history chronic urinary retention Subjects urethral stricture , Subjects bladder neck contracture Subjects urinary tract infection Subjects prostate volume TRUS > 100 mL Subjects suspect neurogenic bladder dysfunction Subjects , opinion investigator , likely complete study whatever reason
